name: Meteor Jazzz
description:
Use the magnets to steer the ship! Beware! The magnets can change sides!

How to play:

A: activate left magnet | D: activate right magnet 

A+D to activate both magnets (and move to center)


Crossing the white line will swap the magnets!

Credits

Game/Level Designer: Guilherme Machado

Music and SFX: Diogo Deves, Patrick Oliver, Lohan Dietrich, Penélope Herradon 

Art: Lucas Rivarola

Programming: Rafael Garcez

Advisor: Penélope Herradon 

For Global Game Jam 2022
